name: Striping Partner
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by its own effect. If the activation of a monster effect activated on your field is negated (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. When this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Cyberse monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Striping Partner" once per turn.
